    <script>
        $(() => {
            OnLoad();
        })
        async function OnLoad() {
            var userName = getCookie("SepetMusteri", true);
            if (userName) {
                $('#loggedUserContent').removeAttr('hidden');
                $('#unLoggedUserContent').remove();
                $('#UserName').html(userName);
            }
            else {
                $('#unLoggedUserContent').removeAttr('hidden');
                $('#loggedUserContent').remove();
            }
            ReadSepetCount();
            ReadCookiePermission();
        }
        async function ReadCookiePermission() {
            var cookieAllowed = getCookie('ItopyaCookieAllowed');
            if (!cookieAllowed) {
                $("#cookiePolicy").removeAttr("hidden");
            }
            else {
                $("#cookiePolicy").remove();
            }
        }
        function createCookie(name, value, interval, intervalType) {
            var expires;
            if (interval) {
                switch (intervalType) {
                    case 0://saniye
                        interval = (interval * 1000)
                        break
                    case 1://dakika
                        interval = (interval * 60 * 1000)
                        break
                    case 2://saat
                        interval = (interval * 60 * 60 * 1000)
                        break
                    default://gun
                        interval = (interval * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
                        break;
                }
                var date = new Date();
                date.setTime(date.getTime() + interval);
                expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
            }
            else {
                expires = "";
            }
            document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
        }
        function getCookie(c_name, Utf8) {
            if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
                c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=");
                if (c_start != -1) {
                    c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
                    c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
                    if (c_end == -1) {
                        c_end = document.cookie.length;
                    }
                    var cookieval = document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end);
                    if (!Utf8)
                        return unescape(cookieval);
                    else
                        return decodeURIComponent(cookieval);
                }
            }
            return "";
        }
        $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip({
            trigger: 'hover'
        })
        // Scroll Top
        $(window).scroll(function (event) {
            var scroll = $(window).scrollTop();
            var header = $('header').innerHeight();
            scroll > header ? $("#scrollUp").fadeIn().css("display", "flex") : $("#scrollUp").fadeOut();
        });
        $("#scrollUp").on('click', function () {
            $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, "fast");
        });
    </script>
    

    <script>

        /* Cache Clear Section
            $(document).ready(function () {

                $.ajax({
                    cache: false
                    //rest of your ajax setup
                });

                caches.keys().then((keyList) => Promise.all(keyList.map((key) => caches.delete(key))));
                caches.keys().then(list => list.map(key => caches.delete(key)));

        pasteDetected = false;

        $('#searchBar').bind("paste", function (e) {
            setTimeout(function () {
                SearchBarAc(true);
                pasteDetected = true;
            });
        });


        $("#searchBar").on("click", () => {
            if ($("#searchBar").val().length > 0) {
                SearchBarAc(false);
            }
        });

        $("#searchBar").on("blur", () => {
            SearchBarKapat();

        });

        function AramaYap() {
            var text = $("#searchBar").val();
            window.location.href = "/ara?bul=" + text;
            event.preventDefault();
        }


        var timeoutId = 0;

        var searchBar = document.getElementById("searchBar");

        searchBar.addEventListener("keyup", function (event) {
            if (event.keyCode === 13) {
                var text = $("#searchBar").val();
                window.location.href = "/ara?bul=" + text;
                event.preventDefault();
            }
            if (pasteDetected == false) {
                clearTimeout(timeoutId); // doesn't matter if it's 0
                timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
                    if ($('#searchBar').val().length > 0) {
                        SearchBarAc(false);
                    }
                    else {
                        SearchBarKapat();
                    }
                }, 500);
                pasteDetected = false;
            }
        });


        function SearchBarAc(force) {
            if ($('#searchBar').val().length > 0 || force) {
                $(".searchResult").html('<div class="lds-ripple"><div></div><div></div></div>');

                if ($(".searchResult").css("display") == "none") {
                    $(".searchResult").slideDown();
                }

                $(".searchResult").load("/Home/SearchBarResult?text=" + $("#searchBar").val().replace(/\ /g, '---'));
                setTimeout(() => {

                    pasteDetected = false;
                }, 505);
            }

        }

        function SearchBarKapat() {
            $(".searchResult").slideUp();
        }

    </script>
    <script>

        function ReadMore() {
            if ($("#divRead").css("margin-bottom") == "10px") {
                $("#divRead").css("height", "auto");
                $("#divRead").css("margin-bottom", "9px");
                $("#divReadMore").html("Gizle");
            } else {
                $("#divRead").css("height", "19em");
                $("#divRead").css("margin-bottom", "10px");
                $("#divReadMore").html("Devamını Oku");
            }

        }

        function ButonDisableYonet(btnId, text, aktif) {

            var btn = $("#" + btnId);
            if (aktif == 0) {
                btn.html('<span class="spinner-grow spinner-grow-sm" role="status" aria-hidden="true"></span><span > &nbsp;&nbsp;' + text + '</span >');
                btn.addClass("disabled");
            } else {

                btn.html(text);
                btn.removeClass("disabled");
            }
        }


        function btnSepeteEklePress() {

            var sepetbtns = $(".sepeteEkle");

            sepetbtns.map((e, i) => {
                if ($(i).hasClass("mob")) {
                    $(i).prop("disabled", "disabled");
                    $(i).html('<span><i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin fa-3x"></i></span>');
                } else {

                    $(i).html('<span><i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin "></i> İşlem Yapılıyor</span>');
                }
            });
        }


        function btnSepeteEkleSuccess() {

            var sepetbtns = $(".sepeteEkle");

            sepetbtns.map((e, i) => {
                $(i).addClass("sepeteEklendi");
                if ($(i).hasClass("mob")) {
                    $(i).html('<i class="fas fa-check fa-3x"></i>');
                    setTimeout(() => {

                        $(i).removeClass("sepeteEklendi");
                        $(i).prop("disabled", false);
                        $(i).html('<i class="fas fa-shopping-cart fa-3x"></i>');
                        $(i).blur();
                    }, 2500);

                } else {
                    $(i).html("Sepetinize Eklendi");
                    setTimeout(() => {

                        $(i).removeClass("sepeteEklendi");
                        $(i).prop("disabled", false);
                        $(i).html("Sepete Ekle");
                        $(i).blur();

                    }, 2500);
                }
            });
        }




        function btnSepeteEkleError() {

            var sepetbtns = $(".sepeteEkle");

            sepetbtns.map((e, i) => {
                $(i).prop("disabled", false);
                if ($(i).hasClass("mob")) {
                    $(i).html('<i class="fas fa-shopping-cart fa-3x"></i>');
                } else {
                    $(i).html("Sepete Ekle");
                }
            });
        }

        async function ReadSepetCount() {

            var sepetCount = getCookie('SepetUrunSayisi');

            sepetCount = sepetCount ? sepetCount : 0;

            $("#sepetCounter").html(sepetCount);

        }

        function swalAlert(type, title, text) {

            Swal.fire({
                icon: type,
                title: title,
                text: text,
                confirmButtonText: 'Tamam'
            })
        }


    </script>

    <script>
        const observer = lozad(); // lazy loads elements with default selector as '.lozad'
        observer.observe();
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        async function wsAsk() {
            $.ajax({
                url: '/GetWsUPAsk',
                type: 'get',
                success: (html) => {
                    //alert(html);
                    $('#wsAsk').html(html);
                }
            });
        }

        async function openWs() {
            if (!isMobile())
                window.open('https://web.whatsapp.com/send?phone=908502592696', '_blank');
            else
                window.open('https://wa.me/908502592696', '_blank');

        }
    </script>

</body>
</html>
